story.title: Our Story
story.desc_1: LD Capital is a leading crypto fund in investment and trading in primary and secondary markets, whose sub-funds include Beco Fund, FoF, hedge fund, Meta Fund, etc.
story.desc_2: Since its establishment in 2016, LD Capital has successively invested in more than 300 enterprises. With a highly professional global team and unique industrial resource advantages, LD Capital has laid its emphasis on offering superb services after investments, aiming to support the project in enhancing its long-term value and ecological investment throughout the life cycle.

vision.title: Vision
vision.desc_1: We yearn to be prosperous for more than 88 years, to invest in and serve more than 500 killer projects, and to emerge as a global leading investor with over US$100 billion crypto assets under management.
vision.desc_2: We seek to create positive impact and sustainable value around the globe by offering life-cycle solutions via diverse strategies for a range of market opportunities and competent infrastructure support.

cultur.title: Cultur
cultur.desc: Client First, Play as a team, exercise prudence and integrity, uphold openness and transparency.

feature.title: Edge
feature.desc_1: Top token HODL and lead investor in many cases
feature.desc_2: Big player of DAOs and DEV communities
feature.desc_3: Wide deal resourcing channels with global/local VC partners in Asia, EU, US
feature.desc_4: Strategic partnership with crypto media and exchanges
feature.desc_5: Global meet-up host for LD Portfolio and sponsor of Hackathon
feature.desc_6: Key players in top crypto projects

team.desc_1: If you have an innovative idea and would like to make your dream come true with our support, please send a summary of your project, as well as a brochure and/or white paper to:
